      • onSegment

        public static boolean onSegment(Point p,
                                Point q,
                                Point r)
        Given three colinear points p, q, r the function checks if point q lies on line segment pr
        Parameters:
        p - the point being checked
        q - starting point of the edge
        r - ending point of the edge
        Returns:
        true if q lies on the sigment of pr

      • orientation

        public static int orientation(Point p,
                              Point q,
                              Point r)
        To find orientation of ordered triplet (p, q, r). The function returns following values 0 --> p, q and r are colinear 1 --> Clockwise 2 --> Counterclockwise
        Parameters:
        p - the point being checked
        q - one of the points of the edge
        r - one of the points of the edge
        Returns:
        the type of the orientation

      • doIntersect

        public static boolean doIntersect(Point p1,
                                  Point q1,
                                  Point p2,
                                  Point q2)
        The function that returns true if line segment 'p1q1' and 'p2q2' intersect.
        Parameters:
        p1 - one of the points of the p1q1
        q1 - one of the points of the p1q1
        p2 - one of the points of the p2q2
        q2 - one of the points of the p2q2
        Returns:
        true if p1q1 and p2q2 intersect

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(LinkedList polygon,
                        int n,
                        Point p)
        Check if one point is inside the polygon.
        Parameters:
        polygon - the polygon
        n - the number of vertices
        p - the point being checked
        Returns:
        true if the point p lies inside the polygon[] with n vertices
